svg.text: Full 16x8 grids shown. Control row is last row (y7 on 16x8, y15 on 16x16). Columns x0..x15.
x4..x7 = Pattern record/play (auto-quantized length on stop).
x0..x15 = Slice/step triggers. Hold first then press second = inner loop.
If second < first, inner loop plays reverse. Exit returns to normal playback.
x0..x12 = Control page buttons (Speed, Pitch, Pan, Volume, Grain, Filter, Swing, Gate, Browser, Group, Mod, Preset, Step).
x13/x14 = Step Edit pitch -/+ semitone (only in Step Edit). x15 = Quantize toggle.
Notes: Control pages are reorderable. Step Edit tools live on y0 and use full grid for step editing.
y0 tools: x0 Velocity, x1 Divide, x2 RampUp, x3 RampDown, x4 Probability,
x5 Attack, x6 Decay, x7 Release (Pitch tool).
y0 strip select: x8..x13 (banked by 6). x14/x15 = bank -/+.
y1..y6: steps for selected strip. x0..x15 = step index.
y7 control row: page buttons; x13/x14 pitch -/+ semitone; x15 quantize.
Per strip row: x0 = No group. x1..x4 = Assign to group 1..4.
x6..x11 = Direction: Normal, Reverse, PingPong, Random, RandomWalk, RandomSlice.
x13..x15 = Play mode: Loop, Step, Grain. (x5/x12 are visual spacers.)
y0: x11/x12 = page -/+; x13..x15 = mod slot select (A/B/C).
y1..y6: x = step index; y = value. Bipolar mode maps center row to 0.
Per strip row: x0 Prev, x1 Next. x3..x8 = Favorites (hold to store).
x11..x14 = Bars (1,2,4,8). x15 = Capture recent audio.
Based on current code: MonomeController, MonomeGroupAssignActions, MonomeFileBrowserActions.
